name: Piracy Pong Warfare
description: This game is a 2D simulator shooter between terrorists and U.S.A army. The gameplay is similar to the famous game "Pong". This game isn't finished we are working on it ! It is just an alpha. ( 1st game be nice ♥ ).  The goal is to kill terrorists and make destruction with killstrikes. For example if you kill 10 terrorits the game will load a Humvee and this one will kill other insurgents.  The game will be developed a lot , i think about 2 players mod and more contents (choice of weapons, choice of side,choice of difficulty , and probably more maps).
